update bus_account set FirstName = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LastName = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EmailAddress = #{emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SelectedCurrency = #{selectedCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ShoeSize = #{shoeSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Vice = #{vice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FingerPrintLogin = #{fingerPrintLogin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VacationMode = #{vacationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BuyingPayment = #{buyingPayment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BuyingBilling = #{buyingBilling,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BuyingShipping = #{buyingShipping,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SellerPayment = #{sellerPayment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SellerBilling = #{sellerBilling,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SellerPayout = #{sellerPayout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Facebook = #{facebook,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Google = #{google,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sina = #{sina,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CommoditySizeFollowing = #{commoditySizeFollowing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserExp = #{userExp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UserLevel = #{userLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SellFeeOfWatches = #{sellFeeOfWatches,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SellFeeOfHandbags = #{sellFeeOfHandbags,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SellFeeOfSnakers = #{sellFeeOfSnakers,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, StripeCustomerId = #{stripeCustomerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where AccountCode = #{accountCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select case when a.category = 1 then '鞋' when a.category = 2 then '服装' when a.category = 3 then '手表' when a.category = 4 then '包' end as category, CONCAT(ROUND(a.cnt / b.csum * 100, 2),'','%') percent,b.csum total from (select bc.CategoryCode category,count(1) cnt from bus_order bo left join bus_commondity bc on bo.CommondityCode = bc.CommondityCode where bo.OrderType = 'sell' and bo.Seller = #{accountCode} group by category) as a, (select count(1) csum from bus_order bo where bo.Seller = #{accountCode}) as b
